mapper.select: select * from employees e, project_emp pe, projects pro, project_tech prote, techs tech where pe.employee_id= e.employee_id and pe.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.tech_id = tech.tech_id and e.employee_id= #{employeeId} and sysdate >= start_date and sysdate <= end_date

select * from project_emp pe, employees e, position po where pe.EMPLOYEE_ID=e.EMPLOYEE_ID and e.position_id=po.position_id and project_id= ( select pe.PROJECT_ID from employees e, project_emp pe, projects pro, project_tech prote, techs tech where pe.employee_id= e.employee_id and pe.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.tech_id = tech.tech_id and sysdate >= start_date and sysdate <= end_date and e.employee_id= #{employeeId})

select * from employees e, project_emp pe, projects pro, project_tech prote, techs tech where pe.employee_id= e.employee_id and pe.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.tech_id = tech.tech_id and pro.approval = 'O' and e.employee_id= #{employeeId} and sysdate >= end_date

select * from DEPARTMENTS dept, PROJECTS pro, EMPLOYEES emp, project_tech prote, techs tech where emp.EMPLOYEE_ID = dept.DEPARTMENT_MANAGER and pro.DEPARTMENT_ID = dept.DEPARTMENT_ID and prote.project_id = pro.project_id and prote.tech_id = tech.tech_id and pro.approval = 'O' and pro.TEAM_ID is null and pro.START_DATE>=sysdate and emp.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
select * from projects pro, teams team where END_DATE >= sysdate and pro.TEAM_ID = team.TEAM_ID and pro.TEAM_ID like 'D%'
select * from teams where team_id like 'D%'
